name: INCancelWorkoutIntentHandling
desc: The interface that handles requests to cancel a workout.

items.name: func resolveWorkoutName(for: INCancelWorkoutIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the workout name that the user wants to cancel.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INCancelWorkoutIntent, completion: (INCancelWorkoutIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that your app is able to cancel the workout.

items.name: func handle(intent: INCancelWorkoutIntent, completion: (INCancelWorkoutIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles the canceling of the workout.
